name: Cop Bullet: Gang War Fighting
description:
Here is the Best 3D Action role play game. City Police Combat Strike is the addictive shooting game.

You must be hero. The city needs you. Become a hero policeman and fight the crime. Gangs and Mafia are everywhere on the city. Innocent people in the danger. Fight the crime. Shoot to kill gangs and save the innocent people and city.

Different police weapons and different police car. This game is the best police car simulator and police simulator.

Realistic city map and city life. Good traffic system, HD Graphics and more.

If you like the shooting game or action game. This game waiting for you. Take the police weapon and listen to police radio. Dangerous missions waiting for you.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
